messages.text:
Hey everyone,
I've been working on a simple render engine with ModernGL and GLFW. Do most people here use ModernGL for Julia game dev?

elements.text:
Hey everyone,
I've been working on a simple render engine with ModernGL and GLFW. Do most people here use ModernGL for Julia game dev?

messages.text: Most people seem to be use talking to SDL in my impression.

Hey guys! I would like to create a gui for a checkerboard (like tic-tac-toe or chess) game using Julia. What package would you guys recommend?
I found Gtk.jl which seemed to have the most detailed documentation but I still seem to struggle with basic things like changing the color of a button etc. How would I go about doing that?
